data.quote: You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.
data.author: Gandhi

data.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
data.author: E. E. Cummings

data.quote: Great minds have great purposes, others have wishes. Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: The start is what stops most people.
data.author: Don Shula

data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you desing for the present.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: If you want to build a ship, don’t drum up the men to gather wood, divide the work and give orders. Instead, teach them to yearn for the vast and endless sea.
data.author: Antoine de Saint

data.quote: You are not in the universe, you are the universe, an intrinsic part of it. Ultimately you are not a person, but a focal point where the universe is becoming conscious of itself. What an amazing miracle.
data.author: Eckhart Tolle

data.quote: We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.
data.author: Kurt Vonnegut

data.quote: “Talent is God-given. Be humble. Fame is man-given. Be grateful. Conceit is self-given. Be careful.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: A man cannot build a reputation on what he is going to do.
data.author: Henry Ford

data.quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
data.author: Herman Melville

data.quote: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it
data.author: Henry David

data.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
data.author: John Quincy Adams

data.quote: Be the person your dog thinks you are.
data.author: J.W. Stephens

data.quote: Being strong means rejoicing in who you are, complete with imperfections.
data.author: Margaret Woodhouse

data.quote: Nobody can make you feel inferior without your consent.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: The best way out is always through.
data.author: Robert Frost

data.quote: More is lost by indecision than wrong decision.
data.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

data.quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
data.author: Carl Sagan

data.quote: If you don’t risk anything, you risk even more.
data.author: Erica Jong

data.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
data.author: Michael Jordan

data.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: If you can't yet do great things, do small things in a great way.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Make sure your worst enemy doesn’t live between your own two ears.
data.author: Laird
